alert.note: Alert for Arlington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 03 at 2:48AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Residual flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...Portions of DC, central Maryland and northern Virginia, including the following counties: the District of Columbia. In central Maryland, Prince Georges. In northern Virginia, Arlington. * WHEN...Until 545 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is ongoing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 248 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported ongoing flooding along Sligo Creek, Rock Creek, and the Anacostia. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arlington... Bowie... College Park... Greenbelt... Langley Park... Beltsville... Bladensburg... University of Maryland... Fort Totten... Gallaudet University... Howard University... Rosslyn... Laurel... Fairland... Landover... Hyattsville... White Oak... Takoma Park... East Riverdale... Adelphi... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
